## Documentation Checklist
- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guide](https://github.com/aisleron/aisleron.docs/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/aisleron/aisleron.docs/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) and agree to abide by their terms.
- [ ] I have signed my commits (`git commit -s`).
- [ ] I have verified that new pages include the required **Front Matter** (title, parent, nav_order).
- [ ] I have checked for broken internal links.
- [ ] I have run `bundle exec jekyll serve` locally to preview my changes.
- [ ] I confirm that no AI-generated images or visual artifacts are included.
- [ ] Any AI-generated text has been reviewed for accuracy and reflects current software behavior.



- [ ] I have signed off my commits using `git commit -s`.
- [ ] I have included relevant test coverage for these changes.
- [ ] If applicable, I have updated the **automated screenshot runner** to capture new/updated UI states.
- [ ] I have submitted a corresponding Pull Request to the documentation repository.
- [ ] I verify that any AI-generated code has been reviewed and tested by me.
- [ ] I confirm that no AI-generated images or visual artifacts are included in this PR.
- [ ] I have translated all new/modified strings into all supported languages.

---
layout: default
